conbody.p: Eucalyptus implements a secure protocol for registering separate components so that the overall system canâ€™t be tricked into including a component run by an unauthorized administrator or user. You only need to register components the first time Eucalyptus is started after it was installed.
To register the components for the first time Eucalyptus is launched, start each component separately in the order listed in the following sections, and then register each one.
